dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT PROC_ID, PROC_INST_DATE, PROC_SL_ID, IFNULL(PROC_INST_BAGS,0) PROC_INST_BAGS, IFNULL(PROC_INST_KGS,0) PROC_INST_KGS, IFNULL(PROC_INST_PRICE,0)PROC_INST_PRICE, PROC_BAG_MARKS, PROC_LIQOUR, PROC_INST_INSTRUCTIONS, PROC_FACT_DATE, IFNULL(PROC_BAGS,0) PROC_BAGS, IFNULL(PROC_KGS,0) PROC_KGS, IFNULL(PROC_FACT_REJ1_NUM,0) PROC_FACT_REJ1_NUM, IFNULL(PROC_FACT_REJ2_NUM,0) PROC_FACT_REJ2_NUM, IFNULL(PROC_FACT_PRICE,0)PROC_FACT_PRICE, IFNULL(PROC_FACT_CLEAN2_PRICE,0)PROC_FACT_CLEAN2_PRICE, T2.TYPE_DESC AS CLEAN2TYPE, T1.TYPE_DESC AS TYPE, GRADE_NAME, IFNULL(PROC_FACT_KKK_KGS,0) AS KKKKGS, GETKGSTOBAGS(IFNULL(PROC_FACT_KKK_KGS,0),0) AS KKKBAGS, (IFNULL(PROC_FACT_REJ1_KGS,0) + IFNULL(PROC_FACT_REJ2_KGS,0)) AS REJKGS, GETKGSTOBAGS((IFNULL(PROC_FACT_REJ1_KGS,0) + IFNULL(PROC_FACT_REJ2_KGS,0)),0) AS REJBAGS, (SELECT STOCK_PRICE_50 FROM stocks WHERE STOCK_SL_STOCK_ID = PROC_SL_ID) AS PRICE, (SELECT GETBAGTOTALVALUE(STOCK_PRICE_50, STOCK_BAGS, STOCK_KGS) FROM stocks WHERE STOCK_SL_STOCK_ID = PROC_SL_ID) AS COST, CASE PROC_INST_HP WHEN NULL THEN NULL ELSE 'HAND PICK ' END AS HANDPICK, CASE PROC_INST_GS WHEN NULL THEN NULL ELSE 'GS ' END AS GS, CASE PROC_INST_SORT WHEN NULL THEN NULL ELSE 'SORTEX ' END AS SORTEX, CASE PROC_INST_COLOR_SORT WHEN NULL THEN NULL ELSE 'COLOR SORTEX ' END AS CSORTEX, CASE PROC_INST_TRIAL WHEN NULL THEN NULL ELSE 'FIVE BAG TRIAL ' END AS FIVEBAGTRIAL, CASE PROC_INST_BLOW WHEN NULL THEN NULL ELSE 'BLOW ' END AS BLOW FROM processes LEFT JOIN types AS T1 ON PROC_TYPE_CODE = T1.TYPE_CODE LEFT JOIN types AS T2 ON PROC_FACT_CLEAN2_TYPE_CODE = T2.TYPE_CODE LEFT JOIN grades ON PROC_GRADE_CODE = GRADE_CODE WHERE PROC_ID = :PARAM_1
